pages.text: The $(item)Loot Fabricator$() is a machine that can well.... $(item)Fabricate Loot$() from the various accessible $(item)Pristine Matters$().$(br2)This process requires $(l:1_machines/3_energy)Energy$() aswell as a selected $(item)Item$() to produce $(item)Loot$().
The selected $(item)Item$() will be remembered for automation puposes, it will stay selected until its unselected.
